title: Add customized travel packages, per-km car rental pricing, T&C, railway/flight booking sections, replace hero image

requirements.text: Add a 'Custom Travel Packages' public page and section. The page must allow users to submit a personalized travel package inquiry by specifying: destination type (India / Abroad), specific location/destination (free text), number of travelers, trip duration (number of days/nights), and preferred travel dates (optional). On submission, store the request as an inquiry in the backend with category 'custom_package'. The page must be accessible from the main navigation and from the homepage.

quotes: Add some Travelling packages which will be personally costumized according to the travel location india & abroad and depending on the number of traveller's and duration of their stay

acceptanceCriteria: A new 'Custom Packages' or 'Plan My Trip' page exists and is linked in the header navigation.
The form collects: destination type (India/Abroad toggle or dropdown), destination name, number of travelers, duration in days, traveler name, phone number, and email.
On valid submission the form data is stored as an inquiry with category 'custom_package' and a success toast is shown.
The admin inquiries page displays custom package inquiries with all submitted fields visible.
The homepage has a prominent CTA or section directing users to this custom package planner.

requirements.text: Extend the backend inquiry model to support a 'custom_package' inquiry category. Add fields for: destinationType (text: 'India' or 'Abroad'), destination (text), numberOfTravelers (Nat), durationDays (Nat), and preferredDates (optional text). Ensure the existing submitInquiry or equivalent API accepts these fields and the admin listing displays them.

quotes: personally costumized according to the travel location india & abroad and depending on the number of traveller's and duration of their stay

acceptanceCriteria: The Motoko inquiry type includes optional fields for destinationType, destination, numberOfTravelers, durationDays, preferredDates.
The backend accepts and persists these fields when category is 'custom_package'.
Existing tour inquiry and car rental inquiry categories are unaffected.

requirements.text: Update the Car Rentals page to add a per-km pricing mode alongside (or replacing) the existing daily rate. Display clearly: Sedan at ₹13/km and SUV at ₹21/km. The booking form must capture estimated distance (in km) and calculate/display an estimated fare. Store the distance and estimated fare in the car rental inquiry submitted to the backend.

quotes: add a package for car rental which is 13 rupees per km for sedan & 21 rs per km for suv according to the distance

acceptanceCriteria: Car Rentals page shows Sedan ₹13/km and SUV ₹21/km pricing prominently.
A distance input field is present on the booking form.
An estimated fare is calculated and displayed in real time (distance × rate).
Submitted inquiry includes the selected vehicle type, entered distance, and calculated estimated fare.
Admin inquiries list displays distance and estimated fare for car rental bookings.

requirements.text: Replace the hot air balloon hero image on the website with a new premium travel/luxury car rental themed image. The replacement image must feel high-end, cinematic, and consistent with the black/white/grey premium palette. Update all references to the old image asset with the new one.

quotes: remove that hot air balloon picture from the interface of website and replace it with something premium

acceptanceCriteria: The hot air balloon image no longer appears anywhere on the site.
A new premium hero/banner image is used in its place (luxury car on a scenic road or skyline, dark/cinematic tone).
The new image is a static asset in frontend/public/assets/generated.
The visual theme remains consistent with the black/white/grey premium palette.

requirements.text: Add a Terms & Conditions page and a visible T&C notice on the Car Rentals booking page. The T&C must prominently state: 'Without driver — if anything happens to the vehicle, the consumer is fully liable for all repair and associated costs.' Include additional standard rental terms as appropriate. Link to the T&C page from the footer and from the car rental booking form (checkbox acknowledgment before submission).

quotes: add t&c which is without driver if anything happens to the vehicle then consumer will have to pay for the repair and all

acceptanceCriteria: A dedicated Terms & Conditions page exists at route /terms.
The page includes the clause: 'Self-drive (without driver): The renter is fully responsible for any damage, repair costs, or losses incurred to the vehicle during the rental period.'
The Car Rentals booking form includes a checkbox: 'I have read and agree to the Terms & Conditions' that must be checked before submission.
The T&C page is linked in the site footer.
The T&C checkbox links to the /terms page.

requirements.text: Add a Railway Ticket Bookings section/page to the website. The page should explain the railway ticket booking assistance service offered by Blackrays, allow users to submit a ticket booking inquiry (origin, destination, travel date, number of passengers, class preference, contact details), and store it as an inquiry in the backend with category 'railway_booking'. Link the page from main navigation and homepage.

quotes: add railway ticket bookings + flight ticket bookings section as well

acceptanceCriteria: A 'Railway Bookings' page exists at route /railway-bookings.
The page has a service description and a booking inquiry form.
Form collects: origin station, destination station, travel date, number of passengers, class (Sleeper/3AC/2AC/1AC/General), passenger name, phone, email.
On submission, inquiry is stored in the backend with category 'railway_booking'.
Admin inquiries list shows railway booking inquiries with all fields.
Page is linked in the header navigation under a 'Services' or 'Bookings' group.

requirements.text: Add a Flight Ticket Bookings section/page to the website. The page should describe Blackrays' flight booking assistance service, allow users to submit a flight booking inquiry (origin city/airport, destination city/airport, travel date, number of passengers, trip type one-way/round-trip, contact details), and store it as an inquiry in the backend with category 'flight_booking'. Link the page from main navigation and homepage.

quotes: add railway ticket bookings + flight ticket bookings section as well

acceptanceCriteria: A 'Flight Bookings' page exists at route /flight-bookings.
The page has a service description and a booking inquiry form.

Form collects: origin city/airport, destination city/airport, departure date, return date (if round-trip), trip type (one-way/round-trip), number of passengers, cabin class (Economy/Business/First), passenger name, phone, email.
On submission, inquiry is stored in the backend with category 'flight_booking'.
Admin inquiries list shows flight booking inquiries with all fields.
Page is linked in the header navigation.

requirements.text: Extend the backend inquiry model to support 'railway_booking' and 'flight_booking' categories with their respective optional fields. For railway: originStation, destinationStation, travelDate, passengerCount, railClass. For flight: originCity, destinationCity, departureDate, returnDate, tripType, passengerCount, cabinClass. All existing categories must remain unaffected.

quotes: add railway ticket bookings + flight ticket bookings section as well

acceptanceCriteria: Motoko inquiry type includes optional variant fields or a flexible text map for railway and flight booking data.
Backend accepts and persists railway_booking and flight_booking inquiries without breaking existing inquiry categories.
getInquiries returns all inquiry types including the new ones.

requirements.text: Update the homepage to include prominent cards or sections for all service offerings: Custom Travel Packages, Car Rentals (per-km), Railway Ticket Bookings, and Flight Ticket Bookings — each with a brief description and CTA button linking to the respective page. Ensure the overall homepage layout remains premium and consistent with the black/white/grey Uber-like aesthetic.

quotes: make sure the site looks premium
add railway ticket bookings + flight ticket bookings section as well

acceptanceCriteria: Homepage has a 'Our Services' or equivalent section listing all four services with icons/images, descriptions, and CTA links.
All CTAs correctly route to /custom-packages, /car-rentals, /railway-bookings, /flight-bookings.
The section uses the premium dark/grey palette with white typography.
No orange/amber or hot air balloon imagery remains on the homepage.

constraints: All new inquiry categories (custom_package, railway_booking, flight_booking) must reuse/extend the existing Motoko inquiry model in backend/main.mo — do not create a separate actor.
Do not edit files under frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or frontend/src/components/ui.
All new images must be static assets placed in frontend/public/assets/generated — do not serve images through the backend.
Maintain the existing deployment slug 'blackrays-car-rentals-tours' in frontend/src/config/deployment.ts.
Keep the premium black/white/grey Uber-like theme — do not introduce blue, purple, orange, or amber as primary accents.
nonGoals: Actual third-party railway or flight ticket booking/payment integration (IRCTC, airline APIs) — this is an inquiry/lead capture only.
Real-time fare calculation using external APIs.
Email or SMS notifications to customers or admin (platform does not support outbound messaging).
Changing the existing daily car rental rates (₹2500/day sedan, ₹5000/day SUV) — per-km pricing is additive.
Adding a Rust/JS backend or any external database.

required: Premium cinematic hero banner showing a luxury black sedan or SUV on an open highway at dusk with a dramatic dark sky, high contrast black and white tones with subtle warm road lighting (hero-premium-travel.dim_1600x800.png)
